scripts.build-interactive-browser: cd vendor/interactive-browser && npm install --include=dev && npx vite build --mode production && cd - && rm -rf ./interactive-browser && mkdir -p ./interactive-browser && cp -r vendor/interactive-browser/dist/* ./interactive-browser/
scripts.build-transitions: cd vendor/transitions && npm install --include=dev && npx vite build --mode production && cd - && rm -rf ./transition-study && mkdir -p ./transition-study && cp -r vendor/transitions/dist/* ./transition-study/
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build-interactive-browser && npm run build-transitions
